Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Marquette, Western, and 71st due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Marquette, Western, and 71st due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th due to, construction near 69th/Bell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Rosemont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
